body_html: Try replacing all constants with tf.Variables. TensorFlow does constant propagation on the CPU even if your ops are GPU ops. Using tf.Variables instead of constants prevents constant propagation from occurring.
body_text: Try replacing all constants with tf.Variables. TensorFlow does constant propagation on the CPU even if your ops are GPU ops. Using tf.Variables instead of constants prevents constant propagation from occurring.
body: Try replacing all constants with `tf.Variable`s. TensorFlow does constant propagation on the CPU even if your ops are GPU ops. Using `tf.Variable`s instead of constants prevents constant propagation from occurring.
